If you meet the qualifications, I have been granted the power to personally appoint you a Noblesse. Are you ready? Do you wish to be Noblesse? If so, you must first prove it. Bring me 100 territory badges. [npc_%objectId%_buyNobless @2964|I am qualified. Make me Noblesse!] (Being appointed a Noblesse will cancel any ongoing Noblesse-related quests.)
